page.title: 06St. Mary' Hospital.
page.content: This is one of the island's two main hospitals.Here doctors treat patient's illnesses and nurses care for them. X-rays are used to show the inside of the body to see if bones are broken. Endoscopes with a light on the end of a flexible tube are used to see inside the stomach and the lungs. The pathologist looks at cells of the body to check if they are diseased or not. Blood samples are tested for abnomalities.Surgeons are doctors who operate to remove parts of the body that are making people ill.Other people help patients by exercising their muscles and joints. They are called physiotherapists. Some of the buildings are very old but are decorated to make them clean and attractive. There is to be a new bigger hopital in 1987.
